title: Vizhigalile Vizhigalile Lyrics Kullanari Koottam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
[Vizhigalile Vizhigalile
puthu puthu mayakam yaar thandhaar
Aruginile varugayile
puthu puthu thayakam yaar thandhaar
Unnodu irukkum ponnana nimidam
Ennalum thodardhida nenjam yengum
Vizhigalile ...] (2)

Inbathil idhu enna vagai inbamo ..
Inbathil idhu enna vagai inbamo
Nadandhu pogayil parakuthu manadhu
Thunbathil idhu enna vagai thunbamo
nerupil erivathai unaruthu vayathu
idhuvarai ennaku idhupol illai
Irudhaya arayil nadukam
kanavugal annaithum unpol illai
Puthithaai irukuthu enakum

Unnodu irukkum ponnana nimidam
Ennalum thodardhida nenjam yengum
Vizhigalile ...

Sondhathil idhu enna vagai sondhamo
Iraivan thandha varam inaithadhu nenjam
Mothathil idhu enna vagai bandhamo
Idhalgal sollavillai purindhadhu konjam
Idhu enna kanava nijama idharku
yaaaridam ketpen vizhakkam
Idhu enna pagala irava nilavin
Arugil suriyan velicham

Unnodu irukkum ponnana nimidam
Ennalum thodardhida nenjam yengum
Vizhigalile ...

[Vizhigalile Vizhigalile
puthu puthu mayakam yaar thandhaar
Aruginile varugayile
puthu puthu thayakam yaar thandhaar
Unnodu irukkum ponnana nimidam
Ennalum thodardhida nenjam yengum
Vizhigalile ...] (2)

seo.title: Vizhigalile Vizhigalile Lyrics Kullanari Koottam Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Vizhigalile Vizhigalile Lyrics Kullanari Koottam Song Lyrics from Kullanari Koottam. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Selvaganesh and sung by Chinmayi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Kullanari Koottam, Selvaganesh, Chinmayi, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
